name: Demon Hunter 4: Riddles of Light
description: Dawn Ashmoore is about to uncover the dark mysteries of ancient Egypt. The old gods step into our world.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: 2.0 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB VRAM Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: 2.5 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB VRAM Storage: 3 GB available space
